project.short_desc: Wrote article on Explicit Programming appearing in the March 2003 OnJava Magazine
project.description: Contrasted the concepts of Design Markers and Explicit Programming in an article published in the March 2003 issue of O'Reilly's OnJava.com online magazines  It detailed how Design Markers can be used now to provide many of the benefits of Explicit Programming without relying on experimental tools.

It detailed how Marker Interfaces and JavaDoc can be combined to document Design Choices in the implementation source code.

keywords._list: Java, Design Markers, Explicit Programming, education
